Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing.errors

Class TokenizeErrorContext

java.lang.Object
lanat.parsing.errors.ErrorContext
lanat.parsing.errors.TokenizeErrorContext
public final class TokenizeErrorContext extends ErrorContext
Context for tokenize errors. Provides methods to get data in relation to the tokenization state.

      length - the length of the substring to apply at each side of the index
